___name.gltf_detailedDescription: The user-defined name of this object.  This is not necessarily unique, e.g., an accessor and a buffer could have the same name, or two accessors could even have the same name.
___name.description: The user-defined name of this object.

description: A buffer points to binary geometry, animation, or skins.
title: Buffer

___uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the buffer.  Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.

___byteLength.description: The length of the buffer in bytes.
